TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RectangleAnnotation extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation

remarks.format: ## Remarks A rectangle annotation can display text inside the rectangle, in addition to being displayed as a rectangle only. So you can annotate using a rectangle or a rectangle with text inside it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Two colors are used to draw the gradient, a primary color that is specified the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> and a secondary color that is specified with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the secondary color for an annotation background.
Docs.value: A value used to draw the annotation background with hatching or gradient fill.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This color is used with <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackColor%2A> when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation.BackGradientStyle%2A> property is used.
